channel.title: Billing, Access, Settings on Skyclerk
channel.description: Recent content in Billing, Access, Settings on Skyclerk

item.title: Can I pay With PayPal?
item.description: You can pay yearly with PayPal. Afraid we do not provide an option for monthly billing. In order to pay with PayPal simply click one of the buttons below.

item.title: How can I pay for Skyclerk?
item.description: We accept all major credit cards. Although we are unable to accept other forms of payment, you can pay for several months in advance if you prefer.

item.title: Does Skyclerk work on my Mac?
item.description: Because Skyclerk is web-based it works on any computer with a current web browser and internet connection. We also offer Skyclerk as a mobile application.

item.title: How do I cancel my Skyclerk account?
item.description: Skyclerk is a pay-as-you-go service. You commit for only one month at a time. One possible alternative to canceling your paid Skyclerk account is to simply downgrade to the free plan.

item.title: How do I log in to my Skyclerk account?
item.description: You can log in to your Skyclerk account by visiting https://skyclerk.com/login and entering your email address and password.
